name: Sturgeon v. H. C. Frick Coke Company
name_abbreviation: Sturgeon v. H. C. Frick Coke Co.

judges: Before Green, C. J., McCollum, Dean, Fell and Brown, JJ.
parties: Sturgeon v. H. C. Frick Coke Company.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment in this case is affirmed on the charge to the jury by the learned court below. See Sturgeon v. Hustead, ante, p. 148.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Sturgeon v. H. C. Frick Coke Company.
Argued May 7, 1900.
Appeal, No. 114, Jan. T., 1900, by defendant, from judgment of C. P. Fayette Co., March T., 1898, No. 382, on verdict for plaintiff in case of Daniel Sturgeon and Walter W. Laughead v. The H. C. Frick Coke Company.
Before Green, C. J., McCollum, Dean, Fell and Brown, JJ.
Affirmed.
May 23, 1900:
